website_summaries.verdict: If you need a simple to use shoe or foot deodorizer you can throw in your gym bag, try this spray.
pros: Made with essential oils and all natural products
Just spray in a shoe that smells
The company stands behind the product and is very responsive
This can be sprayed directly on your feet
cons: You may have to experiment to figure out your best odor choice

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works. My shoes were STANK! I have these great running shoes that are more comfortable to wear with no socks (Merrel barefoot style - great!) but they get super funky. This spray smells good and de-stanks em. I still have to wash them and i leave em in the mudroom (not the house for Pete's sake) but I can pretty well keep the funk under control with this spray. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hurd

customer_reviews.title: Whoever created this scent must not have a sense of smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought the natural cedar wood scented spray. I am blown away how bad it smells. My wife walked into our bedroom hours after I had sprayed a pair of shoes, and immediately walked out of the room and yelled what the heck is that smell?!?!? It smells like old pickles. I was wearing the shoes while in my office several days later and I was getting grossed out thinking I had stepped in gum. I checked my shoes and didn’t find any. It then occurred to me that these happened to be the one pair of shoes I had sprayed. So combine that smell with a little sweat and voila, the scent of dirty old chewing gum.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Company and Products
customer_reviews.text: I wrote about the powder which I also bought. The spray has a nice scent and leaves my feet nicely moisturized. I cleaned all of my insoles and now no odor and my feet are even staying dry. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyGran

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but I will not repurchase
customer_reviews.text: This is ok. The scent (I got the cedarwood, ) was alright...a bit strong. It worked for awhile, but with my kids shoes, it eventually made them smell worse and they complained. Odor eaters powder actually was my last resort and has worked phenomenally and I only use it in their shoes once a week.
customer_reviews.author: mommab

customer_reviews.title: One spray and you are SET your feet wont smell at all
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING! Honestly was skeptical at first since I was raised on gold bond foot powder and the such. But after puberty hit nothing from that product line worked. So I decided to take the step and research something that has been proven by other people and the ingredients itself were pure and accurate. The moment I got this bottle my feet stopped smelling completely WITH JUST ONE USE!! I use it on my work shoes and I could not be more satisfied. I am now a Completely loyal customer and I will let everyone know about this wonderful product!!
customer_reviews.author: D'Diedrick

customer_reviews.title: Indelible Scent of Cedarwood
customer_reviews.text: This cedarwood scent is overpowering. I think I wanted something strong for my funky shoes and this is it. It’s a bit too strong though, tbh. But if you want something to supplant the funk, this prolly that.
customer_reviews.author: Anticlimacus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and effective and natural
customer_reviews.text: I had bought rocketpure before. The original scent for my stubbornly stinky feet. This is even better
customer_reviews.author: Intuit

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!
customer_reviews.text: Really does the trick!!some people might not love the scent...but other than that...no more foul odors!!
customer_reviews.author: Dileccio Antonio Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Cools and Soothes Tired Feet
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooling Product! The scent is woodsy and very pungent. I will continue buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: smells great and no wife complaining when my shoes come off, well worth it
customer_reviews.author: ROGER

customer_reviews.title: Nice new scent
customer_reviews.text: Nice new scent! This works! I've tried many other sprays that just didn't work like Rocket Pure like Kiwi, Dr. Scholls.
customer_reviews.author: K. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The smell is maybe a bit too strong for my preference, but I do like the smell of cedarwood and I'm going to get a different scent next time. It's been working really well for me and I use it whenever I need to wear my boots or sneakers so it's been a huge help with that.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Seems to just mix with the bad foot/shoe odor
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for me at all. When sprayed lightly in the shoes, it was aired out for 24 hours, and the scent is still overpowering when you where them. Seems to only add to the bad foot odor, as you can smell it constantly. It helps a little bit to spray on feet, but then shoes still smell horrible, and your feet smell even worse at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates Odor
customer_reviews.text: Product was featured with a lilac looking flower that gave the impression the fragrance would be different from the cedarwood smell that is somewhat over powering.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Braggs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stuff! Nothing has worked well on my husbands stinky feet or sons hockey gear. I’m in love:)
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Quinn

customer_reviews.title: More than just for shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for all my deodorizing needs. I love dark browns, and the scent complements my home decor.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Walsung-Haas

customer_reviews.title: Works instantly
customer_reviews.text: Works great! And works instantly as well. I spray it in my work boots after work and have no smelly boots any more.
customer_reviews.author: LORENZO GUZMAN JR

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Can't really tell if it's just masking the smelliness or if it's actually neutralizing the odor, but either way works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Funk scent but does work.
customer_reviews.text: It has a funky scent to it but does get rid of shoe odor.
customer_reviews.author: Rich P

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: Stinky feet and stinky shoes! If I’d used it with new shoes there there would have been no smell to cover up. But it has done an amazing smell of reducing the bad smell and now my shoes smell great! I don’t think I would have liked my feet and shoes smelling of mint or lemon so I think I made good choice of cedarwood.
customer_reviews.author: VJF

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me unfortunately.
customer_reviews.text: Used as directed and this did not work for me unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If at first you don't succeed...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. I had previously bought the peppermint scent, which wasn't effective, so I tried the cedarwood. What a difference! It worked great! I have no more foot odor, and in fact only need to use it occasionally just so that I stay on top of it. Very happy with this product! Customer service was also exceptional - I was offered a free replacement of a different scent when the peppermint didn't do the trick. But hey, it's not their fault I have stinky feet that resisted the peppermint treatment, so I opted to purchase instead. Hope you'll find that one of these scents works for you, too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: There are nothing better and effective I ever  used
customer_reviews.text: I have morton neuroma, so can't wear any kind of socks... This foot deo is a real saviour for me... Nothing worse than stinky feet...I wish I was find this product years ago instead wasting money on other useless products... I would recommend to wait until your feet completely dry after applying this deo, its the best result. Do not put your wet feet after spraying ( top and bottom) in the shoes..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mint Spray and Cedar Powder worked great for me
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The owner saw my original 2 star review and worked with me to find a combination that worked, which was the mint spray and cedarwood powder. Unlike my original try with just the cedarwood spray this combo is working great. My wife is thrilled. At least you can be assured they offer 100% satisfaction and stand behind their product. Very professional company.
customer_reviews.author: D. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great company, but spray didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: This particular product smelled decent, and was less messy than prefers I've used, but didn't work so well, with my particular body chemistry. That, and the sprayer leaked, when pumped. While this may not have panned out for me, the company was super responsive, and kind enough to send me two free bottles of their foot powder, which smells and works much better (1x lemon, and 1x sandalwood; both 4.5 stars).
customer_reviews.author: Billuame

customer_reviews.title: My feet finally smell amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have never had the best smelling feet... but now I do! I received the package quickly and started using it that night. The feel and smell of the spray is phenomenal. This is some of the freshest smelling sprays I have ever used. Everything feels and is natural. The sellers are amazing as well. I had a problem with my order and they solved it graciously. They even sent me something else for my trouble, one of the best people I have ever ordered from. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very effective!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several pair of previously worn men's dress/casual shoes with very little wear. I immediately applied leather conditioner to the uppers, sprayed this deodorizer inside the shoes and inserted shoe trees into every shoe. The cedarwood scent is complimentary to my cedar shoe trees. Within two days, all four pairs of shoes looked and smelled brand new. The scent is distinctive and smells clean and fresh. Not overpowering but it stays around. I am extremely pleased with the Rocket Pure Cedarwood Shoe Deodorizer.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi M.

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell but works
customer_reviews.text: The scent is really over powering and my dogs hate it. But it does take away any type of shoe odor. I've also used it on camping gear and in bags since they can get smelly and musty and cedar is a known bug deterrent. Overall I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Oloughlin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work for my husband. Have been using for almost two weeks. If you have vinegar smelling feet and shoes try something else. The product smells good and all but mixing it with nasty feet made it worse.
customer_reviews.author: foreverdead

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It is efficient in what it was trying to do, especially for the price, however it can't be perfectly efficient hence the 4 stars. I still smell some odor, and part of the reason why I smell less was the fact that I changed my old insoles. I like it,, though. It takes only one application to be sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Maksym Sovyak

customer_reviews.title: This stuff's GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I've used all three scents, and they're equally effective. Prolongs the useful life of my shoes, and saves embarrassment, in any number of "foot-loose" situations.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Masks odors.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product. Masks the smell for sure. But is it worth $13? No. Maybe in a larger size bottle.
customer_reviews.author: andy spencer

customer_reviews.title: Works and smells great!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my husband's shoes! I like the smell of the essential oil.
customer_reviews.author: K.Sine

customer_reviews.title: Good smell. Keeps the stinky feet smell gone
customer_reviews.text: We always bought another brand before. But I really like this brand. Very effective. Very powerful. And keeps the smell of stinky feet away!
customer_reviews.author: Cfix

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Been using it for a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Been using it for a couple of years! And it is natural!
customer_reviews.author: JLK

customer_reviews.title: Rocket Pure Works
customer_reviews.text: Rocket Pure is a great product. The cedar smell is very pleasant and it really works! I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bahrooce

customer_reviews.title: Noxious smell
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this product. I have used it for a week now. Every night, I would spray my shoes for use in the morning, but they still have lingering smell of this spray. It smells quite pungent and noxious, and I could not stop sneezing whenever I spray. And I feel the spray only masks the shoe odor with its own noxious odor, so it doesn't help anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Does as Intended
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge fan of the scent but it definitely gets the jobs done.
customer_reviews.author: MSW

customer_reviews.title: Maintains Hockey Skates
customer_reviews.text: My sons have been using this for a while now. Its a bit pricey but well-worth it. Two young hockey players who's skates never have an odor. Can't ask for more. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: LADYgRN

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I might just use this as perfume. It smells so good!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda K

customer_reviews.title: Spray to keep your shoes smelling nicely
customer_reviews.text: Amazing that it really smells like fresh cedarwood! Reminded me of new wood furniture or flooring. Now my shoes don't smell so badly. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really great product! The fragrance is subtle after a few moments but lasts all day in the shoe. I have also taken to spraying under the seat in my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy G

customer_reviews.title: No more stinky shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This works great! My sons shoes are very smelly and they stink up the house. This spray has put an end to that! Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawneen Mackay

customer_reviews.title: This Works!
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed it in my shoes and the stench went away. Love this spray.
customer_reviews.author: KTA

customer_reviews.title: The bad smell in the boots caused by the sweat on the feet, no longer exists.
customer_reviews.text: I just started using the product, is very good I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Freshhhhhh
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and keeps my shoes from breaking the Geneva convention.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: all natural
customer_reviews.text: just 2 sprays of mother nature is all it takes
customer_reviews.author: Saad N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love mint scent and it works very well. Lemon scent is nice too. Exceptional customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The smell of my shoes is much more tolerable now. Wish I used it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: xing zeng

customer_reviews.title: It smells a bit like natural big spray but it really works
customer_reviews.text: It smells a bit like natural big spray but it really works! My roommate used to always complain about the smell of my feet but it's definitely gotten better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you "enjoy" the smell of nasty feet!
customer_reviews.text: Made my sons shoes smell like a dead rat lived in them for 4 years. Totally added to the scent of "Stanky Feet". Did not deodorize nor help deodorize. Honestly, they smell worse NOW than they did before. Thanks for that.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

product_meta.title: Natural Cedarwood Shoe Deodorizer, Foot Deodorant Spray. Fights Odor, Stink and Smell. Spray Freshens Better Than Messy Powders, Antiperspirants, Insoles, Sneaker Balls. (Cedar Spray, Single)
feature_bullets: ODOR CONTROL: Effectively fights foot and shoe odor that is caused by bacteria. Our spray freshens feet, sports shoes and sneakers. Deodorizes and keeps feet and shoes fresh all day. Spray deodorizer directly on feet and into shoes, let dry and you are good for the day. Safe for running and leather shoes, boots, sneakers, ballerina shoes and high heels. Can be used in gym bags and in sports gear too!

POWERFUL: Foot odor eliminator spray is ideal for any athlete; runners, including barefoot and minimalist, walkers, cyclists, hikers, skiers, dancers or anyone with stinky feet and shoes! Maximum strength natural foot deodorizer is powerful enough to fight the strongest odors yet gentle enough for sensitive skin. Safe for all men, women, and teens.

MADE IN THE USA: Proudly made in the USA under strict safety regulations and testing. Natural ingredients, no harsh or toxic chemicals, no additives, and paraben-free. Only the best natural and environmentally safe ingredients are used. Made of essential oils of cedarwood, rosemary, and tea tree. Hundreds of sprays in each bottle: 120 ml/4 fluid ounces.

ROCKET PURE GUARANTEE: 100% Satisfaction for the Lifetime of the Product. 100% Refund or Replacement. We know you will love our products but, if you don’t, for any reason, just let us know and we will make it right, no questions asked! We are a small family business providing top quality products and exceptional customer service is our priority.

MORE SELECTIONS: Need more choices? Check out our other Natural Foot Deodorizer and Shoe Deodorant Sprays and Powder Scents: Lemon, Peppermint, and Eucalyptus as well as Rocket Pure’s Muscle Balms, Friction Therapy Anti-Chafe Balms and our Natural Zinc 30 SPF Sunscreens by clicking on "Rocket Pure" above.
